name: ULTIMATE SNAKE
description:
What if the classic game of Snake was ULTIMATIFIED? Find out in ULTIMATE SNAKE! Dodge spike shooters, outrun ghosts, and slither your way through the levels!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD / arrow keys / Dpad to move
  • Q+E / RCtrl+Numpad0 / LTrigger RTrigger to cycle tail

Warning: If the game freezes, you just weren't snakin' hard enough and you have to refresh the page. Sorry pal, try snakin' harder next time

😎
